short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that allows you to quickly copy the current webpage's URL as Markdown, HTML, or plain text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that allows you to quickly copy the current webpage's URL in various formats such as Markdown, HTML, or plain text. Whether you're a developer, writer, or simply someone who frequently shares web links, this extension simplifies the process by providing easy access to different URL formats for copying to your clipboard.
